title: Lime Cilantro Rice
notes: Not the best, but its a change of pace.
Does not reheat well due to fresh cilantro
instructions: Bring the water to a boil; stir the butter and rice into the water. Cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer until the rice is tender, about 20 minutes.
Stir the lime zest, lime juice, and cilantro into the cooked rice just before serving.
